name: LEGENDARY CHEESE
description:
Click LMB on the mouse to select it (you can select a pair of mice), then right-click on the place where your chosen mice will go.

Your goal is to defend the base of mice (that is, yours) from being eaten and eat the base of rats.

Carefully look at the gesture of your opponents - fights between rats and mice take place according to the rules of the game "Rock paper scissors", they win according to the same rules.

Large levels - press W/A to scroll up and down the level.

Dark levels - you can't see your enemies!!! However, the mouse with the lamp is already in a hurry to help! Protect her - she can't fight.

The boss - he has a lot of HP, and you will have to try hard to defeat this legendary cheese eater. Don't let him near your cheese!
